meanings.definition: A histamine H2-receptor antagonist used to treat ulcers and gastroesophageal reflux disease.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cimetidines to help with my stomach ulcers.
meanings.sent2: Many people rely on cimetidines to manage their acid reflux.
meanings.sent3: After taking cimetidines, my stomach felt like it was on vacation.
meanings.sent4: Cimetidines acted like a shield, protecting my stomach from acid attacks.
meanings.sent5: The power of cimetidines against ulcers was like a superhero saving the day.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a class of drugs that reduce stomach acid production.
meanings.sent1: Pharmacists often recommend cimetidines for acid reduction.
meanings.sent2: Cimetidines belong to a group of medicines that lower stomach acid.
meanings.sent3: The cimetidines in the bottle looked like tiny acid fighters.
meanings.sent4: Her stomach welcomed the cimetidines like a peaceful garden after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The effect of cimetidines on acid was as clear as a sunny day.

meanings.definition: A medication commonly prescribed for heartburn and indigestion.
meanings.sent1: When I have heartburn, I take cimetidines for relief.
meanings.sent2: Cimetidines are often used to soothe indigestion symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The cimetidines worked their magic, calming my upset stomach.
meanings.sent4: Taking cimetidines was like giving my stomach a gentle hug.
meanings.sent5: The relief brought by cimetidines was like a cool breeze on a hot day.
